input: The discovery of gravity is one of the cornerstone achievements of science. It was famously propounded by Isaac Newton and is now considered one of the most fundamental forces in the universe. Gravity is a universal force that affects all objects with mass. It also affects light, which is why light is bent when it passes through strong gravitational fields.
output: Isaac Newton is known for his discovery of gravity, a force which affects every object with mass and even bends light as it passes through strong gravitational fields. It is considered to be one of the most fundamental forces in the universe.
